data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 3, Hiroki Kasahara signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Oita's half.
Throw-in for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Oita's Naoki Nomura gets in a shot on goal at Showa Denko Dome Oita. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a throw-in for Oita, close to Kawasaki's area.
In the minute 7, Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
Oita are pushing forward but Kohei Isa's finish is wide of the goal.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, In Oita, Oita push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Oita.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
In the minute 15, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Kawasaki surge into the attack at Showa Denko Dome Oita but Yu Kobayashiâ€™s header is off-target.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Kohei Isa of Oita smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Oita are coming forward and Kohei Isa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Naoki Nomura (Oita) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Oita drives forward and Naoki Nomura gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Oita.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Oita have a goal kick.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Oita.
In the minute 31, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Kawasaki are whistled for offside.
Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita.
At Showa Denko Dome Oita, Shogo Taniguchi is shown a red card and sent off.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Oita.
In the minute 36, Naoki Nomura converts the penalty to give Oita a 1-0 lead.
Oita's Tatsuya Tanaka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kawasaki defender.
In Oita Oita drive forward through Kohei Isa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 41, Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Oita.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Showa Denko Dome Oita the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Oita.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
The second-half is underway at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
The away team replace Tatsuya Hasegawa with Kaoru Mitoma.
In the minute 46, Ao Tanaka is on a sub for Kengo Nakamura for Kawasaki.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 51, Yu Kobayashi (Kawasaki) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Free kick Oita.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Oita.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Oita.
Reo Hatate is replacing Yu Kobayashi for Kawasaki at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Tomohiro Katanosaka is making the team's first substitution at Showa Denko Dome Oita with Kaoru Takayama replacing Yuta Koide.
Yuya Takazawa is replacing Kohei Isa for the home team.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Oita throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 65, Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 67, Kawasaki are pushing forward but Miki Yamane's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 69, Kawasaki pushes forward through Kyohei Noborizato, whose finish on goal is saved.
The home team have replaced Yamato Machida with Kazuki Kozuka. This is the third substitution made today by Tomohiro Katanosaka.
In the minute 74, Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Tomohiro Katanosaka (Oita) is making a fourth substitution, with Yuki Kobayashi replacing Yushi Hasegawa.
Yuto Misao (Oita) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Kawasaki make their fourth substitution with Yasuto Wakizaka replacing Manabu Saito.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Free kick Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
The away team have replaced Miki Yamane with Leandro Damiao. This is the fifth substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Oita.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 82, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Oita's half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 83, Ryosuke Tone is replacing Toshio Shimakawa for the home team.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
In the minute 86, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Kawasaki's Hidemasa Morita gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Oita have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Kawasaki.
Oita needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Oita close to the penalty box.
In the minute 89, Kawasaki will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Oita.
Yuto Misao for Oita gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kawasaki's Leandro Damiao misses with an attempt on goal.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
The match has come to a close in Oita. The final score is 1-0.
